article.description: Chaise Daniels had 17 points and nine rebounds, Mikey Dixon added 16 points, and Quinnipiac overcame a cold-shooting first half to beat Maine 85-75 on Sunday.
article.headline: Quinnipiac scores 57 points in 2nd half to top Maine 85-75
article.linkText: Quinnipiac scores 57 points in 2nd half to top Maine 85-75
article.story: BANGOR, Maine -- Chaise Daniels had 17 points and nine rebounds, Mikey Dixon added 16 points, and Quinnipiac overcame a cold-shooting first half to beat Maine 85-75 on Sunday. The Bobcats only scored nine points through the first 10 minutes of the game and trailed 36-28 at halftime, behind Daniels' eight points. Daniels tied it 40-all early in the second half and Peter Kiss gave Quinnipiac its first double-digit lead of the game at 71-61 with 4:53 left. Maine twice pulled within six points in the final three minutes but Dixon answered with two free throws on the first occasion and Kiss beat the shot clock on the second for eight-point leads. Abdulai Bundu added 12 points and nine rebounds for Quinnipiac (4-6), which scored 57 points in the second half. Wes Myers led Maine (4-7) with 21 points on 9-of-19 shooting. Andrew Fleming had 11 points with eight rebounds and Marko Pirovic added 10 points.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
